articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: A snowstorm brings Munich airport to a standstill and causes travel chaos in central Europe - ABC News
articles.description: Munich’s airport has canceled all flights for the day after a winter storm dumped snow across southern Germany and parts of Austria and Switzerland, affecting travel across the region
articles.content: BERLIN -- All flights were grounded at Munich's airport Saturday after a winter storm dumped snow across southern Germany and parts of Austria, Switzerland and the Czech Republic, affecting travel ac… [+2445 chars]
